name: Ejari Property Technologies Holdings Limited
description: Operator of a real estate technology company intended to provide rent now and pay later service for residential properties. The company rents the unit on behalf of the customer for a period of one year or six months and then re-rents it to the customer with a monthly payment plan, enabling customers to reduce their financial burden and pay rent on a monthly basis.
one_liner: Operator of a real estate technology company intended to provide rent now and pay later service for residential properties. The company rents the unit on behalf of the customer for a period of one year or six months and then re-rents it to the customer with a monthly payment plan, enabling customers to reduce their financial burden and pay rent on a monthly basis.
